items.sentence: Tom really wants to know what you want him to do.
Tom would've done that if Mary hadn't been there.
Tom woke Mary up earlier than usual this morning.
Tom will be heading to Boston after this meeting.
Tom went to Boston and brought his children home.
Tom went into the pub and ordered a pint of beer.
Tom wasn't aware of what was happening in Boston.
Tom is in the garden, and Mary is in the kitchen.
You can get a hold of Tom by calling this number.
Tom bought everyone in the bar a round of drinks.
